UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Potential use of 13-mer peptides based on phospholipase and oligoarginine as leishmanicidal agents.
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol. 2019;226:108612
Literature.Author: Mendes B, Almeida JR, Vale N, Gomes P, Gadelha FR, Da Silva SL, Miguel DC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Leishmania amazonensis MHOM/BR/73/M2269(EC50=50.98µM),Leishmania amazonensis IFLA/BR67/PH8 (promastigote)(EC50=57.23µM),Leishmania infantum MHOM/BR/72/LD(EC50=220.32µM),Leishmania amazonensis IFLA/BR67/PH8 (amastigote)(EC50=17.69µM)
